font-family: 微软雅黑; font-weight: normal; color: #000000; font-style: normal

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 不切实际的，空想的： having or marked by a tendency to be guided more by ideals than by reality
【例】 She had quixotic dreams about the future. 她对未来有着幻想。
【近】 impractical, ideal, romantic, starry, utopian, visionary
【反】 clear-eyed, clear-sighted 聪明的

【记】 音:吉诃德, 源自Don Quixote 堂吉诃德，不实际的幻想者
